name: Kryh Explorer
storyline:
On a planet near of Betelgeuse live the Kryhs.
The Kryhs are crystal-mining creatures that live a monotonous life.
As they say: "Curiosity? Adventure? No, thank you. A happy kryh is a quiet kryh"

Play as Michi, the first adventurer Kryh.
Explore the world, meet other races, improve your equipments and customize your burrow
and most importantly: fly to the moon!

Great adventures are waiting in Kryh Explorer!
summary: Explore the world of the crystal-mining creatures, the Kryh, Meet other alien races, improve your equipments and customize your burrow. Great adventures are waiting in Kryh Explorer!
